name: Gangsta City
description: Gangsta City is a 1 kb first-person shooter. The player assumes the role of a police officer and shoots enemy gangsters. The game takes place on a single location. The player's task is to track down and kill all the enemies while avoiding innocent citizens. The player moves viewfinder to the right, left, up or down. Time meter at the top of the screens shows when the enemy will fire a gun. A body count meter at the bottom of the screens shows killed enemy number.
